questions.question: "Are you tired?" - He asked me if I ______ tired.
"Do you speak English?" - The tourist asked if I ______ English.
"Is this your bag?" - She asked if ______ was my bag.
"May I sit here?" - He asked if he ______ sit there.
"Are the boys playing football?" - He asked ______ the boys were playing football.
"Must we leave now?" - They asked if they ______ leave then.
"Are you going to the citadel tomorrow?" - She asked if I was going to the citadel ______.
She wanted to know ______ I enjoyed the local food.
"Did you finish your homework last night?" - Mom asked if I had finished my homework ______.
Choose the correct sentence: "Do you plan to climb any mountains?"
options: She asked me if I plan to climb any mountains.
She asked me do I plan to climb any mountains.
She asked me if I planned to climb any mountains.
She asked me did I planned to climb any mountains.
questions.answer: She asked me if I planned to climb any mountains.
